name: Tunnnel Arcade Edition
description:
Tunnnel fluye por la web!  Tunnnel flows through the web!

Es
Ideado para ser jugado en gabinete Arcade clásico (con el controversial control alternativo de Guitar Hero), llega a tu Pc para conseguir puntajes cada vez mas altos.

Gráficos psicodélicos, música espacial de °360 con el poderoso Fmod, Tunnnel es un viaje sin fin.

Incluye carpeta con extras, fotos y wallpapers.

En

Concieved to be played on a Arcade cabinet (with it's controversial Guitar Hero controller), Tunnnel comes to Pc, begging for highscores.

Psychedelic 3d graphics, spatial °360 music and sound effects thanks to the powerful Fmod, Tunnnel is a one way trip.

Includes an extra folder with photos and wallpapers, just look it up.

Controls

Left & Right Arrow Keys: Lateral Movement

Right Mouse Click: Advance / Forward

Left Mouse Click: Shoot

2nd Release: 17/3/22 - 23:00hs Virgo Full Moon
